about_the_game:
Lofi Cafe is a gamified focus tool, set to a soothing lofi soundtrack.

Customize your cozy virtual space with character, and boost your productivity with a collection of features designed to improve concentration and reduce stress.

Key Features

  • Soft, soothing music and immersive soundscapes like gentle rain and flowing rivers create the perfect ambient backdrop to relieve stress and help you unwind.

  • Change your character

  • Download your character from Steam Workshop

  • Play Character Animations

  • Take ScreenShots

  • Change Lightings

name: Lofi Cafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD Ryzen 5 2400
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / Radeon HD7870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Lofi Cafe is a focus tool featuring relaxing soundtracks. Customize your cozy virtual space with character, and boost your productivity with a collection of features designed to improve concentration and reduce stress.
